title: Communities: Authenticate window crash and visual issues
body:
# Bug Report ## Description Authenticate button proceed button is out of bounds and app crashes when canceling Additional question here is, when validation popup is canceled the request is send anyway and it's also showing that request is pending (where request to join button is). ## Steps to reproduce * Go to new community * Press "Request to join" * Fail biometrics * Biometrics failed and password popups have buttons out of bounds Here clicking outside the popup sends the request anyway without validation. This send was crashing the app. * Validate correctly using password Here sending request would also crash #### Expected behavior * Button should not be out of the bounds * App should not crash #### Side notes * When I saw first message loaded int one of the chats clicking outside the popup did crash app less frequent #### Actual behavior ### Additional Information - Status desktop version: 0.13rc7 - Operating System: MacOS M1 ## Logs
When successfully authenticating ``` ERR 2023-07-14 09:03:00.650+02:00 error checking all channels permissions: topics="community-service" tid=1790526 file=service.nim:1462 errMsg="key not found: 0x03073514d4c14a7d10ae9fc9b0f05abc904d84166a6ac80add58bf6a3542a4e50a4f431bd0-28d1-4d70-9871-301050b71ee3" ERR 2023-07-14 09:03:00.907+02:00 rpc response error topics="rpc" tid=1790546 file=core.nim:36 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_checkPermissionsToJoinCommunity, code:-32000, message:unsuccessful request: 403 Forbidden ]\n" ERR 2023-07-14 09:03:00.907+02:00 error doing rpc request topics="rpc" tid=1790546 file=core.nim:40 methodName=wakuext_checkPermissionsToJoinCommunity exception="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_checkPermissionsToJoinCommunity, code:-32000, message:unsuccessful request: 403 Forbidden ]\n" ERR 2023-07-14 09:03:00.907+02:00 error checking permissions to join: topics="community-service" tid=1790526 file=service.nim:1409 errMsg= INF 2023-07-14 09:03:11.936+02:00 history request completed topics="mailservers-service" tid=1790526 file=service.nim:183 INF 2023-07-14 09:03:11.984+02:00 history request started topics="mailservers-service" tid=1790526 file=service.nim:178 numBatches=4 INF 2023-07-14 09:03:30.903+02:00 KeychainManager stopped: topics="keychain-service" tid=1790526 file=service.nim:58 errCode=1 errType=keychain errDesc="Could not retrieve private key from keystore: The specified item could not be found in the keychain" Warning: libpng warning: iCCP: known incorrect sRGB profile (:0, ) INF 2023-07-14 09:03:35.710+02:00 history request completed topics="mailservers-service" tid=1790526 file=service.nim:183 ERR 2023-07-14 09:03:40.900+02:00 rpc response error topics="rpc" tid=1790549 file=core.nim:36 err="\nstatus-go error [methodName:wakuext_requestToJoinCommunity, code:-32000, message:unsuccessful request: 403 Forbidden ]\n" ERR 2023-07-14 09:03:40.901+02:00 error [1] 99810 abort /Applications/Status.app/Contents/MacOS/nim_status_client ```
@saledjenic Logs when clicking outside the popup are related to keycard. I'm not using keycard on this device
I see crash when joining is fixed here #11516
The overflowing button has been fixed in master too

@Cuteivist few things... looking into the logs, I cannot say it's keycard lib issue even we know that in some cases keycard lib crashes from some still unknown reason for us. I would rather say it's up to inappropriately handled response for request to join community or something like that, maybe access to property of a nil obj, or maybe direct access to prop of an json object which doesn't exist or something similar. `keycardCancelFlow` is usually called when we closing authenticate popup, even you don't use a keycard (maybe that's something we can improve) but we just call it to clear keycard lib requests, that's why you see the last line `/Users/jenkins/workspace/status-desktop/systems/macos/aarch64/package/vendor/nim-keycard-go/keycard_go.nim(21) keycardCancelFlow`, but I am not sure it's a culprit for the crash.

> @Cuteivist few things... looking into the logs, I cannot say it's keycard lib issue even we know that in some cases keycard lib crashes from some still unknown reason for us. I would rather say it's up to inappropriately handled response for request to join community or something like that, maybe access to property of a nil obj, or maybe direct access to prop of an json object which doesn't exist or something similar. `keycardCancelFlow` is usually called when we closing authenticate popup, even you don't use a keycard (maybe that's something we can improve) but we just call it to clear keycard lib requests, that's why you see the last line `/Users/jenkins/workspace/status-desktop/systems/macos/aarch64/package/vendor/nim-keycard-go/keycard_go.nim(21) keycardCancelFlow`, but I am not sure it's a culprit for the crash.

Good points. I'm wondering maybe crash is caused by a fact that canceling still sends the request
@Cuteivist autentication thing should be fixed in 0.14 (master) https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11335

@lukaszso Then this ticket can be closed :) 
https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/pull/11516 will fix the authenticate crash, so this one will be just duplicate issue
